description: This table stores information about the current coverage statuses of a coverage record.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the coverage record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COVERAGE_STATUS_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The coverage status type category ID for the coverage record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Binder Payment


Enrollment Geographic Area Verification


Geographic Area Investigation

columns.name: COVERAGE_STATUS_RESOLUTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The coverage status resolution category ID for the coverage record. This column's associated ZC table is ZC_CVD_STAT_OUTST_ACT_RES.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not Resolved


Approved


Denied


Canceled


Paid


Failed To Pay


Geographic Area Verification Passed


Subscriber Gained Coverage


Resolved


Under Investigation


Temporary Address


In Geographic Area


Out of Geographic Area

columns.name: CREATION_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The UTC date and time when the coverage gained the coverage status.

columns.name: RESOLUTION_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The UTC date and time when the resolution had its state for this coverage status set.

columns.name: CREATION_DTTM
columns.description: The local date and time when the coverage gained the coverage status.

columns.name: RESOLUTION_DTTM
columns.description: The local date and time when the coverage had its resolution for this coverage status set.

columns.name: COVERAGE_STATE_CHANGE_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The Coverage Status - Change Reason category ID for the coverage record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Geographic Area Verification Result


DTRR TRC 154 Out of Area
